title: Research in Machine Learning Verification
body: Investigated verification of the K-Means algorithm using Microsoft's z3 Theorem Prover.

title: Systems Software Teacher’s Assistant
body: Tutored compiler and OS concepts and built an auto grader that decreased grading time by 50%.

title: UCF Math Lab Tutor
body: Tutored over 100 students in Matrix and Linear Algebra, Discrete Mathematics with proofs, Single and Multivariable Calculus, Ordinary Differential Equations, and Trigonometry.

title: Disney Professional Internship
body: Developed a booking metrics application that increased metric gathering and rendering by over 100%.

title: Object Oriented Programming Peer Tutor
body: Tutored over 30 students in Object Oriented Programming with Java.
